title: Marketplace Roundtable #84: Quant Strategies And Stocks For A Volatile Market
description: In our first episode this week, we speak with Ruerd Heeg, author of Global Deep Value Stocks, about the current market. He explains why he's pessimistic about the market as a whole, but also which quantitative strategies he's following to build a watch list and find interesting ideas. He shares the markets he most likes in today's climate - Poland and Hong Kong offer bargains - as well as over a dozen statistically cheap stocks in 6 different markets. Find Ruerd's Marketplace service here - https://seekingalpha.com/checkout?service_id=mp_276.
